validation.prompt: Does this image contain wine bottles, wine labels, or a wine menu/wine list? Answer only 'YES' or 'NO'.

detection.prompt_template:
Analyze this image and extract all wine information. Return a JSON array of wine objects with this exact structure:

[
  {{
    "wineries": ["Winery Name"],
    "name": "Wine Name",
    "year": "2020",
    "varietal": "Cabernet Sauvignon", 
    "region": "Napa Valley"
  }}
]

Rules:
- "wineries" is always an array (usually 1 item, sometimes multiple for collaborations)
- "name" should be the specific wine name if visible
- "year" can be null if not visible/identifiable
- "region" can be null if not visible/identifiable  
- "varietal" must be one of these exact options: {varietals_list}. If unsure, use Red Blend or White Blend.
- Only include wines you can clearly identify
- If you cannot identify any wines, return an empty array []
- Return ONLY the JSON array, no other text
